articles.title: 5 tips for doing your first Ironman, from a coach who has finished the race 19 times
articles.description: Follow these tips and tricks if you want to perform well in your first Ironman triathlon. It is one of the most grueling races you can participate in.
articles.content:
The Ironman is one of the most extreme endurance races you can participate in.
Certified sport dietitian Marni Sumbal has completed 19 Ironman races, and two Extreme Triathlons.
Here are Sumbal's 5 tips for competing in your first Ironman.

articles.title: Why this fintech exec says a commute is never dead time
articles.description: BOSS Young Executive and LanternPay general manager Mirinda O’Gorman discusses her business travel tips and her favourite triathlon.
articles.content:
Honestly, I was not focused as much on my cycle leg. I hadn’t had as many hours on the bikes ahead of the tri, so I didn’t do as well.
Brisbane didn’t have too long in lockdown last year, but how did the border closures affect your travel schedule?
